item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 05/24/2024 # New Features and Performance Improvements # Database Update: Improved file naming in the database for better visibility of documents. Automatic Overwrite: When uploading files with duplicate names, you have the option to overwrite the existing files for updates. Optimized Database Switching: Enhanced the fluidity of switching databases. Customer Service Access: We have added a customer service portal on the left side of our service interface. If you have any questions, you can contact us anytime.
